messages.message: Would it be possible to store sort, filter and grouping on edit mode of the app? Now when I go out of edit mode and go back in the list of files seems to be reset

@Timo Meijrink to answer your first question, you should be able to edit the app from that screen but there was a bug (which should’ve been addressed by now). Is this on aihub.uat? @danny.lan any idea if this has been pushed to that environment?
Great, my assumption is that the fix just hasn’t made its way onto that environment yet

Yes the edit app fix hasn’t been pushed to that environment yet.
@Timo Meijrink To clarify do you mean when editing an app, if you select sort/filter/group options, then click “Open app” and click “Edit app” the sort/filter/group options should be saved?
I think what he means is that in Build he wants to be able to reload and see the same sort/filter/group settings saved
